title: Update Creative Set Request
description: Request parameters for modifying a creative set. Can update metadata, trackers, add/remove creatives, or regenerate existing creatives.

creative_set_id.description: Unique identifier for the creative set to update

name.description: Updated name for the creative set

trackers.description: Updated tracker templates. Existing creatives will be regenerated with new trackers.

archived.description: Archive or unarchive the creative set. Cannot archive if connected to an active media buy.

add_creatives.description: New creatives to add to the set

assets.description: Assets for imported creatives (keyed by role)

landing_url.description: Landing page URL for this creative

remove_creative_ids.description: Creative IDs to remove from the set
